00037 /*
00038  * Synchronizer_Helper.h
00039  *
00040  *
00041  *  Created on: 07-Jan-2011
00042  *      
00043  */
00044 
00045 #ifndef SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_
00046 #define SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_
00047 
00048 #include <string>
00049 
00050 //!A helper class for the synchronizer
00051 /**
00052  * Each helper object implements synchronization algorithms
00053  * for maintaining the data structures in sync
00054  *
00055  * The Synchronizer class depends on this interface to enable
00056  * synchronization of a multi-machine LDA set-up
00057  */
00058 class Synchronizer_Helper {
00059 public:
00060     virtual void initialize() = 0;
00061     virtual void synchronize() = 0;
00062 
00063     //!Returns true as long as all items to be
00064     //!synchronized are not synchronized
00065     virtual bool has_to_synchronize() = 0;
00066 
00067     //!After this call, has_to_synchronize()
00068     //!should return true
00069     virtual void reset_to_synchronize() = 0;
00070 
00071     //!This is a callback from the Client
00072     //!when an async_putNget is used on the Client
00073     //!So when a Client is instantiated, you need
00074     //!to pass a reference of (*this)
00075     virtual void
00076             end_putNget(const std::string& word, const std::string& counts) = 0;
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif /* SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_ */
